mapper.select: SELECT pk_order "pk_order", vbillcode "bill_code", po_order.pk_org "owner_id", po_order.pk_supplier "pk_supplier_code", bd_supplier.name "pk_supplier_name" FROM po_order JOIN bd_supplier ON bd_supplier.pk_supplier = po_order.pk_supplier WHERE po_order.forderstatus ='3' AND NVL(po_order.dr, 0) = 0 AND NVL(bd_supplier.dr,0) = 0 AND taudittime > '2018-02-25' AND po_order.vbillcode in('CD2018022600000754','CD2018031900000756')
